snippet: In Corporate Challenge races, the main goal is camaraderie and team building, but in a region like New York full of people who do not like to lose, the team competition can be heated.
abstract: Corporate Challenge races, intended to foster camaraderie and team building among coworkers, have become increasingly competitive in places like New York and London; firms scour rulebooks for loopholes and seek amateur runners to act as ringers, extending their corporate strategies to the running track.
lead_paragraph: In Corporate Challenge races, the main goal is camaraderie and team building, but in a region like New York full of people who do not like to lose, the team competition can be heated.

headline.seo: JPMorgan Corporate Challenges See Growth in Popularity and Gamesmanship
headline.main: Corporate Rivalries and Strategies Extend to the Street
headline.print_headline: Corporate Rivalries and Strategies Extend to the Street
